courses.title: Computer Science
courses.description: Includes courses in programming languages, algorithms and data structures, computer architecture, software engineering, artificial intelligence, machine learning, database systems, and computer networking.

courses.title: Architecture and Urbanism
courses.description: Includes courses in design theory, architectural history, building materials and construction technology, environmental sustainability, urban planning and design, and the integration of technology and design.

courses.title: Business Administration
courses.description: Includes courses in accounting, finance, marketing, operations management, human resources management, business ethics, and entrepreneurship.

courses.title: Electrical Engineering
courses.description: Includes courses in circuit analysis, electronics, electromagnetism, digital systems, control systems, signal processing, and communication systems.

courses.title: Environmental Science
courses.description: Includes courses in ecology, environmental chemistry, earth systems science, environmental policy and law, conservation biology, and sustainable resource management.

courses.title: Journalism and Communications
courses.description: Includes courses in media law and ethics, news writing and reporting, broadcast journalism, public relations, advertising, media history and theory, and multimedia storytelling.

courses.title: Psychology
courses.description: Includes courses in cognitive and behavioral psychology, abnormal psychology, developmental psychology, social psychology, statistics and research methods, and neuroscience.

courses.title: Biology
courses.description: Includes courses in molecular and cellular biology, genetics, evolution, ecology, microbiology, and physiology.

courses.title: Political Science
courses.description: Includes courses in comparative politics, international relations, political theory, public policy and administration, American government and politics, and research methods.
